title: WayfarerWanderer
description: This project is a hotel booking website developed during a hackathon. Leveraging technologies such as React, Express, and Node.js, it offers a seamless booking experience for travelers.

title: 3D Model Gallery
description: Explore a React-based 3D Model Gallery featuring Blender's .glb files, brought to life with Three.js. Immerse in digital artistry where creativity meets dazzling technology.

title: Laptop Shoping Gallery
description: This gallery features intuitive navigation, detailed specifications, and a seamless user experience, making it the go-to destination for finding the perfect laptop match.

title: ShellProgram
description: Interactive shell script for user engagement: greets based on time, offers file and directory management, arithmetic operations, and system information retrieval through a menu-driven interface.
